name: Bella Lunaux: The Case of the Diamond Panther Tiara
name_original: Bella Lunaux: The Case of the Diamond Panther Tiara
description:
A short story about a New Orleans kitty cat detective named Bella Lunaux. The Diamond Panther Tiara has gone missing under mysterious circumstances, play and see the story unfold!

Made with https://github.com/johnhues/aether-game-utils
